rows.label: tev016901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Solan about the role of support staff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Solan if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Solan about mimeosomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Solan about mimeosomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0001
rows.name:
Us support staff are the ones who have to clean up
BLADE's messes in the maintenance center and
commercial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0002
rows.name:
As a "doctor" who heals the wounds of BLADEs,
I actively serve in a support capacity.
It keeps me far busier than I would like![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0003
rows.name:
There is no end to the foolishness of BLADEs who
throw themselves into battle and sustain needless
wounds in their every encounter![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0004
rows.name:
Should you end up in a combat role yourself,
I urge you to equip yourself properly to avoid
sustaining any preventable damage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0010
rows.name:
I can't believe a fellow alumnus of my elite university
chose to become a BLADE of all things![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0013
rows.name:
And this was a man so accomplished that he stood
out even among the top students at our university.
He could have been a politician! Or a CEO![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0014
rows.name:
But instead he chooses to put his precious life at risk
with one dangerous mission after another. I cannot
even begin to comprehend what he is thinking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0024
rows.name:
So in your amnesia, you'd even forgotten that your
own body had been replaced with a mimeosome?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0025
rows.name:
That is utterly absurd! But, as a mimeosome technician,
I suppose I should be proud that our work could be so
thoroughly confused with the real thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0026
rows.name:
It is the ultimate testament to how close mimeosomes
have come to real bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0027
rows.name:
A number of unimaginably advanced technologies
have been employed so that you and I can live on
without conscious awareness of our artificial bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0028
rows.name:
And I trust that even knowing the truth, living in a
mimeosome still feels comfortable? If so, thank your
mimeosome technicians by taking good care of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0033
rows.name:
When we reclaim our real bodies, I imagine those of
us in BLADE's civilian support staff will be bidding
farewell to our mimeosomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0034
rows.name:
But I also expect that currently active BLADEs will retain
their mimeosomes for the time being.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0035
rows.name:
Given the kind of dangerous missions BLADEs undertake
here on Mira, regular bodies with permanent death are
far too great a risk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0041
rows.name:
So long as indigens persist here on Mira,
we should have plenty of use for mimeosomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0042
rows.name:
Which means that New LA will continue to have need
of my prodigious intellect for the foreseeable future.
Hmph! What a bother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Solan about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_SEL1041
rows.name: Ask Solan about the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0029
rows.name:
It is we civilians who support you BLADEs from within
the city as you do battle outside of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0030
rows.name:
We perform a great variety of duties, from technicians
like myself to commercial district merchants who
procure and sell the items you require.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0031
rows.name:
And as the "doctor" who heals your wounds,
my support duties keep me quite busy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0032
rows.name:
All I ask in return is that you prepare yourself with
the proper equipment and supplies, so that my time
is not wasted treating preventable wounds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0036
rows.name:
Aren't you that acquaintance of H.B.'s?
How is he performing as a BLADE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0037
rows.name:
He and I once studied together, and he stood among
the best and brightest of students even by the august
standards of our prestigious university.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0038
rows.name:
I expected he'd enter politics or start a corporation,
but instead he enrolled in the military as soon as he
graduated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0039
rows.name:
And now he serves as a BLADE. I can't help but
wonder what it is about such work that would stimulate
a genius of his caliber.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0040
rows.name:
The pursuit of justice? The spirit of service?
For as long as I've known him, I have never been
able to fathom his motivations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0048
rows.name:
So in your amnesia, you'd even forgotten that your
own body had been replaced with a mimeosome?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0049
rows.name:
As a mimeosome technician, I suppose I should be
proud that our work could be so thoroughly confused
with the real thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0050
rows.name:
It is the ultimate testament to how close mimeosomes
have come to real bodies. I'll trust you'll be able to
continue living comfortably with it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0051
rows.name:
A number of unimaginably advanced technologies
have been employed so that you and I can live on
in the cosmos without stress.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0052
rows.name:
And those technologies carry an equally unimaginable
cost. So do not risk unnecessary damage to your
mimeosome because you think it can be "easily fixed."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0067
rows.name:
When we find the Lifehold and reclaim our real bodies,
I suppose we'll be bidding farewell to our mimeosomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0068
rows.name:
And then? Who knows? Maybe I'll quit my job as a
mimeosome technician and study to become a true
physician.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0069
rows.name:
Playing doctor to BLADEs has left me with a newfound
desire to make a career out of saving lives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0070
rows.name:
I would be throwing away a doctorate in engineering,
as well as my career as a mimeosome technician.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev016901_MSG0071
rows.name:
Heh. As well as my right to mock H.B. for having done
the very same thing.[ST:wait ]
